title: Mandatory Palestine
summary: Mandatory Palestine[lower-alpha 1][1] (Arabic: فلسطين‎ Filasṭīn; Hebrew: פָּלֶשְׂתִּינָה (א"י)‎ Pālēśtīnā (E.Y.), where "E.Y." indicates Ērētz Yīśrā'ēl, the Land of Israel) was a geopolitical entity established between 1920 and 1948 in the region of Palestine under the terms of the League of Nations Mandate for Palestine.
